website_summaries.verdict: This large model features a super-strong fan, but it's difficult to see inside and the clock turns off after 5 minutes.
pros: Attractive, modern design with a touchscreen interface that only requires a light touch
Customers report that the fan is quite strong and it vents very effectively
cons: Can be difficult to see inside to keep an eye on what's cooking with the door closed
After 5 minutes, the clock's display turns off to save power, which can be annoying

customer_reviews.title: Works great plenty of power and unit itself and fan are ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as difficult to install as some reviewers have said, from start to finish was about 1 hour, which included moving my vent pipe (already installed from previous unit) about 2 inches back. Works great plenty of power and unit itself and fan are very quiet. All-in-all I am very pleased with this microwave. As for the breaking handle I find this handle to be very secure no problems with quality. Also this unit is one of the higher rated microwave ovens in many unbiased reports, and has one of the lowest repair records.
customer_reviews.author: JoLoLo

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and functions well
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is attractive in my kitchen. The touch pad is not as sensitive as my last microwave's touch pad. The time disappears after 5 minutes. This is an energy saving feature and when you touch the energy saver button is reappears, but only for another 5 minutes. I do not like this feature and would like the time to remain on at all times. The microwave is powerful and cooks and reheats the food well. The timer only goes off one time and does not repeat to remind you. The microwave lacks a safety feature to prevent it from starting if the door has not been opened and there is no food in it.
customer_reviews.author: Blue hydrangers

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I've always installed top-of-the-line "K-brand" nukers, and while they're nice, there was no stock for my vacation house updating recently... so I bought and installed this LG. Installation was straight-forward, and operation is equally intuitive and straight-forward. And it turns out, I LIKE THIS LG WAY-MORE than my expensive Krap microwaves. Longevity remains to be seen, but operation of this LG is nothing short of perfect at this point, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: LG Microwave fits our needs
customer_reviews.text: Although this unit is was harder to install than I thought it would be, the result was a nice addition to our kitchen. The cooking times are quicker than our previous Sharp microwave, and the features are more expansive than the Sharp also. I would definitely purchase this unit again. Now if it will hold up longer than a free-standing Amana Radar Range that my parents purchased in the middle 70s and we have in the basement apartment of our home.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very noisy
customer_reviews.text: Started off fine and functioned well. Over time it started to get noisy. Over time it has developed a loud metallic noise which got progressively worse and become unbearable. Every time I put it in it sounds as if pieces of metal are rattling.
customer_reviews.author: unicorns176

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Choice
customer_reviews.text: Just after the 1 year mark this product broke. The buttons are functional but it no longer starts and cooks. I had it fixed once and it broke again shortly after. Only 2 adults use it infrequently. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: Will it last 10 years?
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is supposed to do. Hope it lasts 10 years, like others I’ve had. Nowadays we pay high prices for things that last a couple of years. Not good. If this one craps out in a couple if years, I am Seriously thinking about going retro, to standard cooking methods. Generations of humans did great without a microwave oven.
customer_reviews.author: Abdias

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: The timer only makes a small beep, once. So if you are out of the room, and come back in you do not know it went off. So I will be buying another timer for cooking. The clock on the microwave small not easily visible. Still trying to figure out the settings for cooking. It is much hotter than my previous microwave so trying to adjust to using the settings. I guess I did not realize how much I used my timer and clock on my other microwave. I would not buy this one again. I am sure I will adjust and get use to this one. No problems with the true mechanics of the microwave. It works fine.
customer_reviews.author: ses

customer_reviews.title: Installation was harder than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and works as advertised. If you are replacing an old unit with this one yourself most likely the front screws holding the unit to the cabinet will not match the existing hole so be prepared! That is when the fun starts! I wish they would make the nuts on the top adjustable so it could move in at least one direction.
customer_reviews.author: Farzin

customer_reviews.title: Door hinge - problem
customer_reviews.text: There is never mention in any reviews about how much space the hinges need when opening. I mounted this flush left to wall. The door wouldn't open. Ther only way to find one that worked is the see what was in showroom. Forget reviews
customer_reviews.author: H. Bareiss

customer_reviews.title: Get the extended warranty!
customer_reviews.text: The only good aspect of this purchase was that I paid the extra $35 for the extended Assurant warranty. I was generally pleased with the microwave for most of the first year, except that as others have pointed out, the plastic piece above the door broke during the first year of use and had to be replaced. The main problem is that after only a year-and-a-half of regular use, the magnetron stopped working entirely (light, fan, turntable, and keypad, but no microwaving). Thankfully, Assurant is issuing a full refund because I am still within my 3-year extended warranty period, but it's a shame since the microwave still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Small dent, but otherwise, great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Box was a little damaged (cardboard was cut into and had holes and smashed areas), and there was a small dent in the microwave which sucks, but otherwise, super happy. Product arrived very quickly, super affordable, and the microwave features everything I was looking for. The dinner plate setting is amazing and a real life saver with reheating leftovers. And I love having a soften function for butter when I bake!
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Easy ordering and installation.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave replaced a GE over the range microwave that blew up. We like the look and finish. This is one of the lower end LG over the range models but it looks great. Installation took about 45 minutes. Per the instructions I had to change the venting blowers to re circulation and I had to drill 2 holes for the top mounting bolts since the LG and the GE holes didn't line up. It all went together without a snap!
customer_reviews.author: David J

customer_reviews.title: Window viewing small
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and we never installed one before it works great easy to use the only thing I don’t like is the viewing window is small and since it is above the stove and I’m short can’t see what is cooking so just have to open door and check it cooking power and fan is great
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Kauffman

customer_reviews.title: Worst fan ever
customer_reviews.text: The fan has little to no suction for any over the range ventalation. Called in warranty work which was difficult to get but once they came they checked it out and the barrier for passing is if it will support a piece of paper. The suction is same regardless of which speed you choose and it won't vent steam from a boiling pot of water. Big POS.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 that both died just after the year warranty expired.
customer_reviews.text: Have bought 2, both lasted less than 2 years but lasted just over the 1 year warranty
customer_reviews.author: Fernando J

customer_reviews.title: Unit looks fantastic and has a solid feel to it
customer_reviews.text: Install was a breeze. Can be done with one person. Fan setting on low is quiet. 4th setting on fan is called turbo and it flat moves some air. Unit looks fantastic and has a solid feel to it. Visibility thru window is poor but I really don't need to see anyway.
customer_reviews.author: andrea burchard

customer_reviews.title: The touchpad does not work well. It is very ...
customer_reviews.text: The touchpad does not work well. It is very hard to push the buttons and sometimes I have to push two, three, even four times to get them to work!
customer_reviews.author: jason west

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: No complains I've had this for 2 months now and it's great! Came 5 days sooner than expected and very well packaged. It was even easy to install !
customer_reviews.author: River Rainbow

customer_reviews.title: The microwave fit perfect and works very well
customer_reviews.text: The microwave fit perfect and works very well. It was so nice to pick the exact item needed and have it delivered to the house. So many times when going to the appliance stores they are limited and you can end up purchasing something you were not really satisfied. Also, I did not have to haul it up the stairs myself.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria webb

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 years
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our last LG microwave that lasted 8 years, with this one. This one lasted 2. My wife, our little boy, and me use it to warm things up daily. Rarely cooked anything longer than 1-2 minutes in it. Professionally installed.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan G

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It would be 5 stars if it wasn't dented. Cooks popcorn on AUTO a little too long, about 20 seconds. Cooking baked potato, be sure to turn it over when the time starts counting down, almost perfect. Works 2 at a time too.
customer_reviews.author: JBW

customer_reviews.title: An Excellent Microwave.
customer_reviews.text: This unit replaced a microwave of another brand that at 7 years of use was no longer economically repairable. For slightly more the the cost of the repair, I got an updated unit that has worked much better over the last year.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: I love it but...
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave it 4 stars instead of 5 is that the dark part of the glass covers up the food. Since it is over the range, I have to get on tiptoes to even see inside the microwave, and then I can see only the top of the food in there.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: GE Profile is more user friendly but will only last a couple years, Hope this one lasts forever
customer_reviews.text: All I am judging this unit on is looks and usability, The clock does not continuously display, the mounting holes do not match up with GE. I prefer the usability and comfort of controls of a GE Profile however you can expect to replace the GE Profile every couple of years with a control panel fault after my 3rd GE in 9 years I decided to buy this LG Not as user friendly however it may last longer who knows.... The other comments you read are correct. View window is small, under lite is dim inside is black and if your not venting through the roof you will have to change the vent system.(everything you need is included)
customer_reviews.author: Gary Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I have never ordered an appliance online but I’m glad I did. This was a great deal and it has really held up. We love our microwave and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Shari

customer_reviews.title: LG Microwave
customer_reviews.text: So far our microwave has worked perfectly. Installation was a project as we had to cut the cabinet to accept the range but the system for hanging the unit is simple and directions done well but you better be sure you get the mounting holes positioned perfectly or you will be fiddling with it a lot. Our only criticism so far is with the range light - a halogen bulb that gets very, very hot and yet gives relatively little light - even on the high setting. I would expect a bright LED light in a LG microwave of this caliber. But so far it has proven to be an attractive, powerful microwave.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: Display partially went out
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for a year and a half. Didn't buy the protection plan which I regret. Timer display went out so you can't see how much time you added or have left when it's running. Also the minutes display went out on the clock.
customer_reviews.author: NR9739

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Has many nice features and is very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave and wonderful customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research, I ordered this microwave from HOMEGOODS QUALITY SHOP for our new home. The first one was lost in shipment. Homegoods immediately sent another one. Upon receiving, it was discovered damaged in shipment. Again, Homegoods immediately sent a third with a prepaid FedEx label for the damaged one. This one was the charm and it installed easily with the included templates. The microwave is beautiful and we love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Butch Reed

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER!
customer_reviews.text: What an absolute piece of garbage. Worked for exactly two months past the one year manufacturer warranty (what a shocker) then went bust.
customer_reviews.author: np1018

customer_reviews.title: Product looks nice and was not too difficult to install
customer_reviews.text: Product looks nice and was not too difficult to install. So far it has been working very well, we are very pleased! Although, when it was delivered there were two pretty good sized dents, but once installed only one was partially visible on the side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much heat, such power
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave, super powerful... but my clock seems stuck in eco-mode no matter how many times i turn eco-mode off.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've had this Microwave for 16 months and have had no problems. It looks great and functions as it's supposed to. The sensor cooking is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: LeGal212

customer_reviews.title: My wife is okay with it, so it is all good.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in good shape, easy to install but I like the ones that automatically start when pressing 1-9 for 1-9 minute durations better.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph G.

customer_reviews.title: works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.text: the sound of the buttons are a little loud. other than that, works perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: Love my new microwave
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice microwave for the money. Looks expensive! Everything works great. Not difficult to install.
customer_reviews.author: Pcnative

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 1 to 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Don't like that you can't turn off the beeps when pushing buttons. Exhaust fan is louder than I would like. Power to the unit went off in between warming up separate dishes. Under warranty, but LG is having a hard time finding a service provider to get it repaired. Currently in day 4 after making warranty request.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W

customer_reviews.title: Arrived and looked fine. I installed it and turned it on
customer_reviews.text: Arrived and looked fine. I installed it and turned it on. Was VERY noisy, mush louder than a regular microwave. Called LG and asked to have it serviced under warrantee. LG told me that they would send someone, but I would have to pay the cost IF they find it is an installation issue. Not worth it for me, just returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Leonid A. Malyutin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price tag
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product 3.5 years ago, and it has already stopped working. The longevity of this product is poor and not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, easy to clean if mounted over cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: It is whatever the builder it is. Very good quality, easy to clean if mounted over cooking ovens, strong fan and kind of quite...
customer_reviews.author: Ali M

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: The clock on the microwave tends to go out but that is not a problem for me since I have clocks everywhere. I really like the different light settings and the fan exhaust speeds. It has many features and probably many that I will never use since I am not a cook. Overall I am pleased with this microwave.
customer_reviews.author: wvsmokey

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave
customer_reviews.text: Looks very classy and strong, also works well. Quality built
customer_reviews.author: Tim Robson

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: works well although would like to have the quick cook option
customer_reviews.author: kurt w schiller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great microwave and it got here next day , bravo!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: stan smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is one beautiful, powerful microwave! Be ready, and watch things as it heats up really quick!
customer_reviews.author: the awesomeness

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: You can see every fingerprint on the key pad but besides cleaning it often it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J Meduna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent unit, much faster heating than my old unit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent unit, much faster heating than my old unit. I like the "add 30 seconds" button and the turntable.
customer_reviews.author: Mighty Bros

customer_reviews.title: Good quality works great easy to install fit right on ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality works great easy to install fit right on my preexisting wall bracket from different maker must be universal part only guessing though not possitive
customer_reviews.author: michael lawless

customer_reviews.title: Excellent microwave!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality microwave! It's a big model, so it's really a 2-3 man installation. This was a replacement for another microwave, so there wasn't too much of an issue in the installation; did need to drill a few hole, but the template made that easy. We've had it for a few months and couldn't be happier with it. No problems at all! Heats quickly and we love the one-touch buttons. The viewing window is a bit small, but who really watches their food cook? You'll be happy you bought this!
customer_reviews.author: DB Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Wish I wouljd have chosen a different one.
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged/ dented on the back. The opening that you can see through on the door is so small I cannot see in the microwave. I'm 5'4". The beeper on the touchpad and when the cooking ends is super loud - there is no way to soften it so we had to turn it off completely - such a pain!
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: All smashed upon removing from the box.
customer_reviews.text: The back side, bottom and corners are smashed. The box appears ok but the styrofoam inside is smashed.
customer_reviews.author: ArachniGRIP

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking, nice design and works great for my lite use of this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the kitchen! Very high-end looking and a ton of high end features at a great price! It does jut out a bit from the cabinets, but it's not bad. The one thing I don't like about this microwave is the display...it needs to be a lot brighter. I wish there was a way to be able to adjust the brightness. Other than that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: William A.

customer_reviews.title: Carton damaged -Checked out OK Installed works fine. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Carton damaged -Checked out OK Installed works fine. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Kennethn Hennig

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this microwave less than a month, but have had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, amazing exhaust fan, great microwave!
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install (amazingly we didn't need to do any adjustments to the vent hole we had from our previous Kitchen Aid microwave) and it works great. It has tons of space inside - it is huge! The vent fan on it is also AMAZING. I cooked fish the other night, put the fan on Turbo and we never had any fishy smell in the house. We have only had it for 2 weeks but so far we are really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angie K

customer_reviews.title: Nice but beat up
customer_reviews.text: So far the microwave has been excellent. When we got it, it was badly damaged out of the box. My husband was able to fix it but it was a little discouraging.
customer_reviews.author: christina staskiewicz

customer_reviews.title: it is nice and quiet and plenty powerful
customer_reviews.text: It's just what we were looking for. it is nice and quiet and plenty powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Mike O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: First time over range microwave experience
customer_reviews.text: Product has been installed for a week. Functions fine although 1000 watt cooking is much slower than 1100 watts on my countertop model. Definite drawbacks are the dark interior with insufficient lighting and the small window opening which prevents short in stature people from being able to monitor cooking progress.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Would NOT recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Worked 3 months then went out...had repaired 3 times and on 3rd visit they deemed it unrepairable. Went a total of 14 weeks with no microwave!
customer_reviews.author: Nansteele

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful microwave! The sensor reheat feature is fabulous
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful microwave! The sensor reheat feature is fabulous! Spot on reheating times and temperatures. Fantastic styling! My cabinets' configuration made mounting process a bit challenging. I'll buy more LG products.
customer_reviews.author: D. Munoz

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Installed easily and looks great. It's only been in use for about a month but we have no complaints. Fan is quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my new mircowave. It looks great, cooks well and is simple to use. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It rattles
customer_reviews.text: The product works fine, but the bottom plate rattles. I tightened the screws but it did not help. I contacted the company but they were no help.
customer_reviews.author: Long Beach Bass

customer_reviews.title: ... problems installed it just right now and it looks great
customer_reviews.text: Microwave arrived on time with no problems installed it just right now and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Adan quintero

customer_reviews.title: life is bad w/lg
customer_reviews.text: worked fine for 4 weeks then it broke having trouble getting it serviced.
customer_reviews.author: rap66

customer_reviews.title: Very bad Vendor to miss the huge dent in this new product!!
customer_reviews.text: We received the micro wave it was packaged good but when we unpacked it there was a huge dent in the back left side. This must have been repacked on purpose. There was no way this dent could have been missed. Very disappointed and such a huge waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Peters

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It works and it looks great but when it was delivered it was also banged up bottom right corner.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: First one received damaged door was not aligned and dent ...
customer_reviews.text: First one received damaged door was not aligned and dent in the back
customer_reviews.author: Peter Stelmach

customer_reviews.title: everything is working fine and looks great
customer_reviews.text: no problems ... everything is working fine and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ahearn

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave, I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.text: Install was really easy, and the microwave looks and works great. The buttons are really touch sensitive and it seems to clean very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Effin Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: had to send it back was damaged when I received it
customer_reviews.author: Rick Papiez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I used it in 6 month and nothing on the micowave operates
customer_reviews.author: nguyen, tang tho ,ba

customer_reviews.title: ... it installed for a few weeks now and works fine. It's a microwave
customer_reviews.text: Had it installed for a few weeks now and works fine. It's a microwave. You plug it in. Fan speeds are great. First time ordering an appliance online and so far very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shrunk in shipment ...
customer_reviews.text: WOW am I ever surprised! The product descriptions states "Spacious 2.0 cu. ft. interior Accommodates a wide range of meal and snack items" this spacious interior is in reality 1.4 cubic feet!!!. LG's claim of 2 cubic feet include all of the little indentations on the sides and bottom So perhaps this unit has a 2 cubic feet capacity .. if you laid it on it's back drilled a hole in the door and poured in 2 cubic feet of liquid! Well so much for honesty in advertising ... I'll write another review when i actually start using my small microwave but for now I feel duped.
customer_reviews.author: Homer3

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is NOT worth the money! I will be sending it back! Does not cook correctly!
customer_reviews.author: Skyeler Maas

customer_reviews.title: First time I've purchased an appliance through Amazon. They ...
customer_reviews.text: First time I've purchased an appliance through Amazon. They delivered it on it's SIDE for some reason (I guess the arrow pointing up was confusing?) but it works nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Kveebee

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this microwave and the price. A great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Adam D.

product_meta.title: LG LMV2031ST Stainless Steel 2.0 Cu. Ft. Over-the-Range Microwave
